data.author: Eser Kaldirim
data.title: The Differences In Cryptocurrencies
data.description: A new wave of digital currency called Cryptocurrencies are here to change the way money is handled forever. These systems work more like virtual currencies than the conventional ones do. Unlike normal currencies, these are not printed like money. They are generated through complex mathematical algorithms that govern the generation of the currency. It is cryptographically protected by complex encryption protocols and runs entirely on computers.  How do Cryptocurrencies work?
